title.rendered: Intellectsoft Hits Two Clutch’s Ratings at Once: Top App and Software Developers 2020

content.rendered:
Intellectsoft has become a Top App and Software Developer in five categories, according to the freshest report from the leading B2B ratings and reviews platform Clutch.

The report highlights a list of the top 15 app development firms across such specialties as Android app developers, app modernization companies, CRM app developers, cross-platform app developers, eCommerce app developers, iPad app developers, iPhone app developers, react Native developers.

We are proud to be recognized among the top 3 global app development firms (for both Android and iPhone app development specialties). And also to hold first place in the “Google App Engine Consultants” category and to be ranked second in the “Java Developers” and “ASP.NET Developers” categories.

Being recognized by Inc. Magazine as one of the 500 fastest-growing companies in the U.S., Clutch is the leading ratings and reviews platform for IT, marketing, and business service providers that connects buyers with top service providers around the world. The platform selected its leaders by analyzing the companies’ reviews from clients, awards, and brand reputation, among other criteria.

The leaders meet their methodology’s standards of excellence and can be trusted by potential B2B buyers to excel at new projects. Clutch’s in-depth research includes industries such as IT services, mobile app, and web development, PR firms, etc.

In turn, Intellectsoft has gained a reputation of a reliable long-term partner in mobile app and software development, specifically in long-term Enterprise software development and Retail projects. Here are some of the latest clients’ quotes:

“Intellectsoft is committed to producing quality results, going above and beyond to ensure the customer receives a high level of support. The team is knowledgeable and hard-working,” – Frode Lervik, CEO, Deltager.

“They are a professional, established company with an enterprise background and a core development team,” – Sam Prasad, Director, Investment Evolution.

“They stood out in terms of UI/UX, working on integrating the UI/UX to the IoT,” — Yar Doroshenko, COO, GeoZilla Family Locator.

Our efforts are regularly recognized by Clutch and similar platforms, as well as the industry’s top publications. We are honored to be recognized as one of Clutch’s top global software and app development providers due to our longstanding presence in the industry, distinguished reputation among our clients, and dedication to meet our clients’ every need.

See our complete profile on Clutch.
